thread.title: Neighbor of Nikolas Cruz says she warned police about shooter

title: Neighbor of Nikolas Cruz says she warned police about shooter
text:
Neighbor of Nikolas Cruz says she warned police about shooter Tuesday, March 20, 2018 - 02:48 
Rocxanne Deschamps, the neighbor of Nikolas Cruz who took care of him for a month after his mother died, recounted the three 911 calls she made about Cruz prior to the Parkland high school shooting that left 17 people dead in February.   
Rocxanne Deschamps, the neighbor of Nikolas Cruz who took care of him for a month after his mother died, recounted the three 911 calls she made about Cruz prior to the Parkland high school shooting that left 17 people dead in February.  //reut.rs/2IDwHyU
